value.title: Can AI grasp related concepts after learning only one?
value.excerpt: Humans have the ability to learn a new concept and then immediately use it to understand related uses of that concept—once children know how to "skip," they understand what it means to "skip twice around the room" or "skip with your hands up.

value.title: Apple Insiders Expose iPhone 16 Pro’s Chaotic AI Plans
value.excerpt: The details come from noted supply chain analyst Jeff Pu, who reports that Apple is looking to build a significant number of AI servers in 2023 before scaling up to “significantly more” during 2024. These will offer two broad forms of AI support: cloud-based AI and “edge AI” which supports on-device AI data processing.

value.title: Australians decide against creating an Indigenous Voice to advise Parliament
value.excerpt: CANBERRA, Australia >> Australians voted in a referendum today against enshrining in the nation’s constitution a mechanism for Indigenous people to advise Parliament on policies that affect their lives.
